content.raw: Since `Clear()` just sets a flag, this line can be executed before the models are actually cleared and cause the test to fail. We can probably just retry a fixed no. of times until we get 0, or somehow get feedback when the `World::ClearModels()` function has finished before checking the model count.
content.html: Since Clear() just sets a flag, this line can be executed before the models are actually cleared and cause the test to fail. We can probably just retry a fixed no. of times until we get 0, or somehow get feedback when the World::ClearModels() function has finished before checking the model count.
